title: Bank and Armored Car Robbery (How-to)
description:
A fantastic book written by our very own NBK at Roguesci (dot) org, showing how people have successfully gotten away with making off with large sums of money.  Topics include the cash, robbery tactics, hiding the loot, spending the loot, evasion, and much more.  You will not see a book like this anywhere else.  32 pages.
